metadata.name: Le Blen FGF Serum 100 mg ml Injection

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in cardiovascular disorders and thrombosis

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: EP 2104R is a gadolinium based small peptide with high affinity and specificity for human fibrin Molecular MR imaging with the fibrin targeted contrast agent EP 2104R allows selective visualization of acute coronary cardiac and pulmonary thrombi
